title: How to Make Metamucil Slime

steps.headline: Add water into a bowl.
steps.description: Get some lukewarm water from the tap and pour some water into a large bowl.

steps.headline: Add Metamucil.
steps.description: Scoop some Metamucil with a spoon and add some Metamucil into the water. This is also a good time to add food colouring if you don't want orange slime.

steps.headline: Mix them together.
steps.description: Using a whisk, spoon, or any other stirring utensil, mix the Metamucil and water together thoroughly. It should be an orange liquid if done properly.

steps.headline: Microwave the mixture for five minutes, ensuring it doesn't overflow.
Remove it from the microwave.
steps.description: Wear some oven mitts to avoid burning yourself and remove the mixture from the microwave once it's done cooking.

steps.headline: Place the cooked mixture into your fridge.
steps.description: Leave it in there for an hour or until it cools down.

steps.headline: Remove from fridge.
steps.description: Once the mixture isn't piping hot anymore take it out off the fridge.

steps.headline: Play with your slime.
steps.description: Carefully remove the slime from the bowl with your hands and play with it by poking or squishing it is your slime after all.
